'''''Ancient Shaman-Song''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to watch [[Fujin]] complete the Rainjade Rite during the {{Quest|An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade}}.
